revised_title: The Action of Nitrites on Blood: A Study of Blood Coloration and Oxygen Absorption
tldr: The author investigates the effects of nitrites on blood, discovering that they alter the color and spectrum of blood and reduce its ability to absorb oxygen. The study also reveals that nitrite-treated blood retains the ability to react with guaiacum paper and peroxide of hydrogen, suggesting that the nitrite compounds formed with oxidized hemoglobin are not fully expelled from the blood.
